title: Please remove snowball items in bot games
body: Please remove {{item:3141}} and {{item:3041}} from bot games because it makes bot games extremely boring to play.

replies.body: one of the main purposes of bots is practice, that whole thing falls down if you remove some of the content people might want to practice with.

The ***only*** reasons to be playing bot games are if you're brand new and need to figure out how the game works, or if you want to get first win of the day. Leveling up a smurf account might be a valid reason too.

Apart from that, why are you even playing bot games? For a level 30 player, they're not for fun. They're either for a fast win or to quickly test something out.
